CustomField.description: Sets the WHERE clause for the Garbage Collector batch's QueryLocator For more complex filtering, consider referencing an IGarbageCollector instance in the "Apex Class Name" field instaed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Format: "SELECT Id FROM SObject WHERE ({Your input here})" ex. "IsClosed = true AND CreatedDate > LAST_N_DAYS:365"
CustomField.label: SOQL Filter
